title: Hong Haier: Juezhan Huoyanshan
original_name: 紅孩兒 決戰火焰山
sinopse:
The story is about the Chinese Tang monk called Tripitaka who leads his fairy animal neophytes Monkey, Pigsy, Sandy, and Horse on a long journey to India in search of the "Script of Wisdom and Truth". Along the journey, they come to a place constantly in flames called Flame Mountain.

(Source: aniDB)
